SpatialDryArtifacts 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Enhanced clump edges detection with parameterized thresholds

Source: R/edge_helper_functions.R
clumpEdges.Rd

Enhanced clump edges detection with parameterized thresholds

clumpEdges(
  .xyz,
  offTissue,
  shifted = FALSE,
  edge_threshold = 0.6,
  min_cluster_size = 40
)

Arguments

.xyz

Coordinate matrix with QC data

offTissue

Vector of off-tissue spot names

shifted

Whether to apply coordinate adjustment (default: FALSE)

edge_threshold

Edge coverage threshold (default: 0.6, was 0.75)

min_cluster_size

Minimum cluster size for morphological cleaning (default: 40)

Value

Vector of edge spot names
